categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Grendreef was an admiral in the naval branch of the Galactic Empire's Imperial Military. Alliance to Restore the Republic intelligence officer Cassian Andor served undercover for a time using the operational alias "Joreth Sward" as Grendreef's assistant at some point prior to Andor's death in the year 0 BBY.

Grendreef was first mentioned in the reference book Star Wars: Rogue One: The Ultimate Visual Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on December 16, 2016. Grendreef first appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity as one of the villains in The Isis Coordinates, an adventure written by Christopher Kubasik and released in June, 1990 for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
